original: Härneman, John Helge, journalist, Göteborg, f. 18/9/99 i Linköp. G. 24 m. Signe Sterner. Barn: Suzanne f. 28, Lars 31. — Stud. v. Linköp. h. a. 1. Bokhand :medhjälp. i Linköp., Kalmar o. Gbg 16-21, medarb. i Ny Tid sed. 21 o. i Gbgs-Tidn. sed. 28, huv:-sakligasl s. kåsör, men också s. reporter o. sportred. Medarb. i radio m. olika dialoger, bl. a. Optimisten o. Pessimisten, sed. 25. Led. av Publ :kl. o. Sv. journ:fören. Skr.: Göteborgs- mysterier (kås. o. humoresker tills. rn. Gunnar Wallin 29, 30, 31 o. 34). Sign.:
translated: Härneman, John Helge, journalist, Gothenburg, b. 18/9/99 in Linköping. Married (in) 1924 to Signe Sterner. Children: Suzanne b. 1928, Lars b. 1931. Studied at Linköping University, completed first year. Worked as an assistant at bookstores in Linköping, Kalmar and Gothenburg from 1916-1921. Collaborated with Ny Tid newspaper since 1921 and with Gbg's-Tidn. since 1928 as a main columnist, but also as a reporter and sports editor. Collaborated in various radio dialogues such as Optimist and Pessimist since 1925. Member of Publ:kl. and Swed. jour:n. Skr.: Gothenburg Mysteries (humor and satire with Gunnar Wallin in 1929, 1930, 1931 and 1934). Sign.:

organization.name: Bookstores in Linköping, Kalmar and Gothenburg
